ELECTRONIC_FORM_ADDR = #{electronicFormAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERIAL_EMPTY_ADDR = #{materialEmptyAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_TYPE = #{auditType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERIAL_SOURCE = #{materialSource,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MATERIAL_TYPE_NAME = #{materialTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAPER_NUMBER = #{paperNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MATERIAL_SPECIFICATION = #{materialSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELECTRONIC_FLAG = #{electronicFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IF_ELECTRONIC = #{electronicFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MUST_FLAG = #{mustFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMON_NUMBER = #{commonNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MATERIAL_SORT = #{materialSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPORT_FLAG = #{reportFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPORTFORM_CODE = #{reportformCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAMINE_POINT = #{examinePoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAMINE_POINT_CARDING_ADDR = #{examinePointCardingAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERIAL_NAME = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAKE_NOTICE = #{makeNotice,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
ACCEPT_STANDARD = #{acceptStandard,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
OTHER_MATERIAL_SOURCE = #{otherMaterialSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERIAL_BASIS = #{materialBasis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
MATERIAL_REQUIREMENT = #{materialRequirement,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
MATERIAL_SAMPLE_OID = #{materialSampleOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERIAL_SAMPLE_URL = #{materialSampleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MADE_MATERIAL_TYPE = #{madeMaterialType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_TYPE = #{roleType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SIGN_FLAG = #{signFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NM_ORIGINAL = #{nmOriginal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NM_COPY = #{nmCopy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUFF_STATUS = #{stuffStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SCENE = #{isScene,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERIAL_NAME_WD = #{materialNameWd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MATERIAL_OID = #{materialOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = 0
